definition: to select on the basis of a vote or consensus
to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)

sentences.english: Excellence papers in the symposium will be chosen for related science journals monograph.
sentences.chinese: 會議評選優秀論文並推薦給相關學術雜誌。

sentences.english: All information provided will be kept strictly confidential and used for selection purposes only by the adjudication panel.
sentences.chinese: 所有資料將嚴格保密，並只供評選團作甄選之用。

sentences.english: Actress Zhao Wei ran second in the poll.
sentences.chinese: 此次評選活動中演員趙薇佔得次席。

sentences.english: To choose the catchword of 2008, Simulated Culture must be included.
sentences.chinese: 評選2008年流行語，“山寨”當有一席之地。

sentences.english: Finally, selected the town of Lo given recognition awards tea experts.
sentences.chinese: 最終，評選出了羅鎮製茶能手給予了表彰獎勵。

sentences.english: The criteria for the selection is "attractive but not necessarily enormous chest."
sentences.chinese: 此次美胸的評選標準是，不要求大，但要有魅力。

sentences.english: I am very grateful to be chosen to be the first recipient of the Oppenheimer Award.
sentences.chinese: 我很感謝委員會評選我爲奧本海默獎的第一位獲獎者。

sentences.english: A project for selecting and implementing assessment models in teaching Art and …
sentences.chinese: 藝術與人文素養指標績優學校評選實施計畫。

sentences.english: He is member of the China region selection committee for World Press Photo Master Class.
sentences.chinese: 他是荷賽大師班中國區評選委員會成員。

sentences.english: The Emerson Process Management Scholarship will be awarded once a year.
sentences.chinese: 艾默生過程控制獎學金每學年評選一次。

sentences.english: Judgers chose 9 final lists finalists in April.
sentences.chinese: 四月評選出最終的九份建議。

sentences.english: The next year, he was named "Person of the Year" by Time magazine.
sentences.chinese: 第二年，他就被《時代》雜誌評選爲“年度人物”。

sentences.english: Want to have your own workspace featured in Workspace of the Week?
sentences.chinese: 想在一週工作區的評選中擁有你的工作區專欄嗎？

sentences.english: There's no Person of the Year measuring stick or algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 不存在什麼年度人物評選量尺或者運算法則。

sentences.english: The Three Shadows Photography Award judges have the ultimate power to interpret the above requirements.
sentences.chinese: 三影堂攝影獎評選委員會對此次評選擁有最終解釋權。

sentences.english: The Three Shadows Photography Award judges have the ultimate power to interpret the above requirements.
sentences.chinese: 三影堂攝影獎評選委員會對此次評選擁有最終解釋權。

definition: to be chosen/to be elected as
to get past the qualifying round/to make it to the finals
evaluation committee/judging panel/judging panel member/adjudicator/abbr. for 評選委員會委員|评选委员会委员[ping2 xuan3 wei3 yuan2 hui4 wei3 yuan2]
to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)
